column4: im having problems with secured networks if its WPA i cannot connect at all and WEP will let me connect but after a while i get kicked off and have to reboot to get it to connect again
have you tried to install the "backport-kernel-modules" package ? ...just curious.
were can i find those?

ever since the ath5k and its predessesor was includes in the kernel modules they have been nothing but trouble ... some of the fixes (not all) how been known to be included in the backport-packages (used it once myself, when I couldn't even get the card to work at all)
Im willing to try it... cause it seems to work fine as long as the connection is unsecured
in the repository you should find something like "linux-backports-modules-wireless-" (and the depeding on your Ubuntu dist, the name of it)
is it installed on a HP Laptop ...just curious as some of them have problem with that card.
its an ACER Aspire5520
ah ok...no worries then
I cannot find any that are specificly for ATH
I'm not sure what you mean ...what do you mean ?
I went to the Synapitc package manager and typed in what you told me to search and got 0 results
please (re)type what you've search for
Backport ath
(if you noticed, I did not ask for you to search for "ATH" at any time...some other chatter said that ...please look at my search string again)
sry :3 your right
no worries :-)
Do i download all the ones for my version of Ubuntu?
no...just the generic  (not the kernel specific)
thank you for all your help i wont be able to check if it works till laiter
but if it dont ill be back here :3
you're welcome...I hope it works
Me too well im out peace
